TOPIC
    about_Erwine.Leonard.T.LteDev

SHORT DESCRIPTION
    PowerShell PowerShell development utility functions.

LONG DESCRIPTION
    Provides utility functions that are useful when developing PowerShell scripts and modules.

EXPORTED COMMANDS
    Following is a list of commands exported by this module:

    Get-ClrSimpleName
        Get simple CLR full name

    Get-FieldUsage
        Get-FieldUsage [-FieldInfo] <FieldInfo> [-IncludeSpecialNamed] [-Verbose] [-Debug] [-ErrorAction <ActionPreference>] [-WarningAction <ActionPreference>] [-ErrorVariable <String>] [-WarningVariable <String>] [-OutVariable <String>] [-OutBuffer <Int32>]

    Get-PropertyUsage
        Get-PropertyUsage [-PropertyInfo] <PropertyInfo> [-IncludeSpecialNamed] [-Verbose] [-Debug] [-ErrorAction <ActionPreference>] [-WarningAction <ActionPreference>] [-ErrorVariable <String>] [-WarningVariable <String>] [-OutVariable <String>] [-OutBuffer <Int32>]

    Get-ParameterUsage
        Get-ParameterUsage [-Method] <MethodBase> [-IsInitVars] [-NonOptional] [-Verbose] [-Debug] [-ErrorAction <ActionPreference>] [-WarningAction <ActionPreference>] [-ErrorVariable <String>] [-WarningVariable <String>] [-OutVariable <String>] [-OutBuffer <Int32>]

    Get-ConstructorUsage
        Get-ConstructorUsage [-ConstructorInfo] <ConstructorInfo> [-Verbose] [-Debug] [-ErrorAction <ActionPreference>] [-WarningAction <ActionPreference>] [-ErrorVariable <String>] [-WarningVariable <String>] [-OutVariable <String>] [-OutBuffer <Int32>]

    Get-MethodUsage
        Get-MethodUsage [-MethodInfo] <MethodInfo> [-IncludeSpecialNamed] [-Verbose] [-Debug] [-ErrorAction <ActionPreference>] [-WarningAction <ActionPreference>] [-ErrorVariable <String>] [-WarningVariable <String>] [-OutVariable <String>] [-OutBuffer <Int32>]

    Get-TypeUsage
        Get object type sample usage

SEE ALSO
	Get-ClrSimpleName
    Get-FieldUsage
    Get-PropertyUsage
    Get-ParameterUsage
    Get-ConstructorUsage
    Get-MethodUsage
    Get-TypeUsage
